name: Virtual Pet Online - Fall Time
description:
Virtual Pet Online - Fall Time is a Windows Port of the HTML5 Game, Virtual Pet Online. A game where you can take care of a Virtual Pet.

Raise your very own Virtual Pet, befriend every Virtual Pet, share Virtual Pets with the world, and go through the Spooky Maze. Plus, there are 3 other Minigames, Rare Virtual Pets, and the Info Book.

[Rating - RGAR 1] [Game - v1.0]
